overview: ‘Clubs aren’t crap; men make clubs crap’ – there is violence-free communication, and there is Maschinenbauergemetzel. This video is a passionate outburst, a bloody commentary on patriarchy, a fest of overreaction: uncompromising, brutal, sensual and ambivalent. Played by Amelie Kriss-Heinrich in an unusual single take.
title: Machine Builder Massacre
